trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication setting used for message exchange.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於訊息交換的驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is anonymous, and that the responder is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器是匿名的並回應程式會驗證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate of the responder is available out-of-band to the initiator.
trans-unit.target: 回應程式憑證是可用的頻外起始端。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器是匿名。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器由 X.509 版本 3 憑證、 驗證和，回應程式由 SSL over HTTPS 來驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated by XML symmetric key tokens.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器和回應程式由 XML 對稱金鑰權杖驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器由 XML 對稱金鑰權杖，來驗證和，而回應程式由 X.509 版本 3 憑證來驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器由 XML 對稱金鑰權杖，來驗證，而回應程式由 SSL 的 SOAP 實作來驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器由 XML 對稱金鑰權杖，來驗證和，回應程式由 SSL over HTTPS 來驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated using the Kerberos protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器和回應程式會驗證使用 Kerberos 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using the Kerberos protocol, and the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器驗證使用 Kerberos 通訊協定，並回應程式由 SSL over HTTPS 驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器和回應程式使用 X.509 版本 3 憑證驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器和回應程式使用 X.509 版本 3 憑證驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder mutually authenticate each other using X509 version 3 certificates, and the responder's certificate is available from the SOAP SSL negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的啟動器和回應程式彼此相互驗證使用 X509 版本 3 憑證和回應程式的憑證可從 SOAP SSL 交涉。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that WS-SecureConversation authentication is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 Ws-secureconversation 驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator and responder obtain a shared security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器和回應程式取得共用的安全性內容，使用安全性服務提供者介面 (SSPI)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by a security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SSPI), and the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器驗證所使用的安全性服務提供者介面 (SSPI)，在安全性內容，並回應程式由 SSL over HTTPS 驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and the responder's certificate is available to the initiator out-of-band.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器使用使用者名稱權杖來驗證，而且回應的憑證可用於起始端的頻外。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the responder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器使用使用者名稱權杖來驗證，而且回應程式由 SSL 的 SOAP 實作來驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動器使用使用者名稱權杖來驗證，而且回應程式由 SSL over HTTPS 驗證。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
